messages.message:
Minor design request. I have a lot of conversations, and the list of them scrolls automatically when the drawer opens. But the ‘New Conversation’ button isn’t pinned to the top. Can we pin it?

https://www.loom.com/share/2e5f78ecf7664e028735e9123a9afa6d?sid=127ef782-bebc-4d1c-8d9b-499816cc1649
@Aayush let's pin the new conversation / project button to the top -- please do this for both converse and build (so we have consistent side bar behavior)
